SRP.A: The next arc clockwise from arc Potter.com is arc {Garcia Global}.

SRP.A: The next arc counterclockwise from arc Garcia Global is arc {Potter.com}.

SC.Q: What is the total flow output from Potter.com?

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow greater than 248? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {260} from {DanielsGroupShop} to {Potter.com}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow less than 102? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {65} from {Garcia Global} to {GillespieShop}, a flow of {48} from {Potter.com} to {DanielsGroupShop}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow between 140 and 201? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {140} from {Potter.com} to {Garcia Global}, a flow of {198} from {Garcia Global} to {Potter.com}, a flow of {141} from {DanielsGroupShop} to {GillespieShop}.

NC.Q: Which flow is larger: from Garcia Global to GillespieShop or from Garcia Global to Potter.com?
NC.A: The flow from {Garcia Global} to {Potter.com} is larger.

NC.Q: Which flow is the largest: from Potter.com to Garcia Global, from Garcia Global to GillespieShop, or from Garcia Global to Potter.com?
NC.A: The flow from {Garcia Global} to {Potter.com} is the largest.

MSR.Q: Which category has the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow?
MSR.A: The category with the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow is {GillespieShop}.

MSR.Q: Which pair has the strongest chord connection in this chord chart?
MSR.A: The strongest chord connection is between {DanielsGroupShop} and {GillespieShop}.

VA.Q: To minimize the crossings between chords, please reorder the outer arcs and list the reorder arc order in clockwise direction.
VA.A: The reordered arc order in clockwise direction is: {Arc GillespieShop, Arc DanielsGroupShop, Arc Potter.com, Arc Garcia Global}.
